title: COVID-19 Vaccine Clinics | Grass Lake Community Pharmacy — Indispensable Health Pharmacy Services
description: GLCP is proudly partnered with The Jackson County Health Department to provide COVID-19 vaccine clinics in Grass Lake, Michigan at the Grass Lake Baptist Church and throughout Jackson County, Michigan at our outreach COVID-19 Vaccine Clinics.
cleaned_text: Vaccines Available at GLCP [COVID-19 VACCINE APPOINTMENTS](/glcp-vaccine-signup) New Booster Doses: [Moderna](https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/-/media/Project/Websites/mdhhs/Adult-and-Childrens-Services/Children-and-Families/Immunization-Information/COVID-EUAs/Moderna-COVID-19-Vaccine-EUA-Fact-Sheet-for-Recipients-and-Caregivers-12-and-up-Bivalent-08312022.pdf?hash=CFF3A7651ECC2A6A02485A3D27C2E757&rev=bcde9caa777941ccbff711fc20c23329) Boosters are NOW Available for [Online Scheduling](/glcp-vaccine-signup) Schedule for 2 Months after primary series OR the last booster The Moderate-Severely Immunocompromised may consider a 3rd primary dose for some vaccines to complete the series. Our Partnership With [The Jackson County Health Department, ](https://www.co.jackson.mi.us/2295/Coronavirus)Grass Lake Community Pharmacy Has Been Able To Provide COVID-19 Vaccines Since The End of January 2021. We're Grateful To Our Vaccine Clinic Hosts + Businesses, Schools, & Organizations Who've Trusted GLCP To Provide Vaccine Clinics! Clinic Hosts: Grass Lake Surgery Center, [Grass Lake Baptist [Hillside United Methodist Church](https://www.hillsideunitedmethodist.com/), [Grass Recipients: [Grass Lake Community Schools](https://www.grasslakeschools.com), [Tenneco](https://www.tenneco.com/)of Grass Lake, Country Meadows Lake, Chelsea! PLEASE DO NOT CALL CLINIC LOCATIONS, including the pharmacy, unless stated otherwise. INFORMATION CAN BE FOUND ON OUR WEBSITE, OR THROUGH YOUR CLINIC LOCATION'S TEAM LEADER. Received A COVID-19 Vaccine? Register for [V-SAFE: A FREE Post Vaccination Health Checker](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/safety/vsafe.html) app for your smartphone Covid-19 Vaccines at Grass Lake Community Pharmacy COVID-19 Vaccine [Appointments Available](/glcp-vaccine-signup) During Our Months after primary series OR last booster dose for those 12 & older AGES 5 (+) WITH [Moderate-Severely compromised immune systems](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/recommendations/immuno.html)are recommended to receive a [SPIKEVAX (MODERNA)](https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/-/media/Project/Websites/mdhhs/Adult-and-Childrens-Services/Children-and-Families/Immunization-Information/COVID-EUAs/Moderna-COVID-19-Vaccine-EUA-Fact-Sheet-for-Recipients-and-Caregivers-12-and-up-Bivalent-08312022.pdf?hash=CFF3A7651ECC2A6A02485A3D27C2E757&rev=bcde9caa777941ccbff711fc20c23329) SPIKEVAX (MODERNA): [FDA Approved](https://www.fda.gov/emergency-preparedness-and-response/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/spikevax-and-moderna-covid-19-vaccine)Vaccine BIVALENT BOOSTER DOSE available 2 Months after primary series OR last booster dose for those 18 & older Adults 18 (+) WITH [moderate-severely compromised immune systems](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/recommendations/immuno.html)are recommended to receive a FULL 3rd Primary Dose of Moderna Booster Dose Mix & Matching Vaccines "... you may choose which COVID-19 vaccine you receive as a booster shot. Some people may prefer the vaccine type that they originally received, and others may prefer to get a different booster. CDC's recommendations now allow for this type of mix and match dosing for booster shots". ( [CDC](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/booster-shot.html)) [Learn About V-Safe](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/safety/vsafe.html) For everyone that has been vaccinated, gearing up to receive their 1st dose, awaiting their 2nd, 3rd, or Booster Dose, Consider V-Safe. This is a FREE smartphone app by the CDC to provide "personalized health-check-ins" along with, a convenient place to report directly to the CDC any side effects that may be experienced. COVID-19 Vaccine Schedules Regular Primary Dose Schedules: after the 1st dose of COMIRNATY (PFIZER), NOVAVAX, OR SPIKEVAX (MODERNA), a 2nd dose is NEEDED Schedule in 3 Weeks (21 Days) for COMIRNATY (PFIZER). 3 to 8 Weeks for NOVAVAX, OR 4 Weeks (28 Days) for SPIKEVAX (MODERNA [Moderate-Severely Immunocompromised can receive a 3rd dose of Pfizer OR Moderna, 4 Weeks (28 Days) AFTER the 2nd dose](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/recommendations/immuno.html) [Bivalent Moderna Booster Dose](https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/-/media/Project/Websites/mdhhs/Adult-and-Childrens-Services/Children-and-Families/Immunization-Information/COVID-EUAs/Moderna-COVID-19-Vaccine-EUA-Fact-Sheet-for-Recipients-and-Caregivers-12-and-up-Bivalent-08312022.pdf?hash=CFF3A7651ECC2A6A02485A3D27C2E757&rev=bcde9caa777941ccbff711fc20c23329)available 2 Months following the completion of the primary series, or most recent booster, for adults 18 (+) [Bivalent Pfizer Booster Dose](https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/-/media/Project/Websites/mdhhs/Adult-and-Childrens-Services/Children-and-Families/Immunization-Information/COVID-EUAs/Pfizer-Recipients-and-Caregivers-12-years-of-age-and-older-08312022.pdf?hash=06049A34B2F7D839A120DE7B8F1C2F27&rev=9cfac437c786424a8e52025065876c82)available 2 Months after the completion of the primary series, or the most recent booster, for those aged 12 (+) Primary Dose Schedules are Different for New Pediatric COVID-19 Vaccines, [Moderna (6 Months - 5 Years)](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/different-vaccines/Moderna.html)and [Pfizer (6 Months - 4 Years)](https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/-/media/Project/Websites/mdhhs/Adult-and-Childrens-Services/Children-and-Families/Immunization-Information/Vaccine-Info/Pfizer-HCP-FS-6m-4y-Maroon-06172022.pdf?hash=2046E5F05475D9F135C13692E13AD893&rev=3974f20bc13a4ddbb9591f46277fe828) [Pfizer 4 Kids (5-11) Booster Doses](https://www.michigan.gov/mdhhs/-/media/Project/Websites/mdhhs/Folder50/Folder3/Pfizer_5_though_11_Fact_Sheet_for_Recipients-COVID-19_Vaccine_Final.pdf?hash=D2882B2F738E685AF4BDE4642360A426&rev=55867117a878490bbb3d6b0d3d4af4d4)available 5 Months after the 2nd dose for Kids 5 - 11 110 E Michigan Ave, Grass Lake,
